attributes.action: re-introduce house prices into the official inflation figures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ones mortgage bill is generally the biggest single payment of most household budgets and as such should be included as part of the official inflation figures.

Greedy estate agents and builders have pushed house prices to what people are able to pay, not what they are worth relative to the rest of the country's economy.

Wages have hardly increased in line with house price inflation.
